name: Airship Climb
description:
Simple climb game, made for LD39

- Collect fuel to "don't run out of climbing power" :)
- Mouse1 or Space to jump.
- Jump height is variable, depends on how long you pressing jump button

*Also you can hack some game parameters for fun.  
Get windows version, go to assets and open settings.json.  
Be carefull, don't break the game ;)*

Have fun ;)
